## LengthNode class

Calculates the length of a vector

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class LengthNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns sqrt(x.x + x.y + x.z + ...), the Euclidean length of the vector. Supports vector inputs (vec2, vec3, vec4). Always returns a float scalar.
